about_the_game: Included in this DLC is a pack of 20+ 4k wallpapers captured in game by photographer Chris Taljaard. Chris has masterfully captured these images using art of rally's in-game photo mode, showing us all what can be achieved when a pro gets their hands dirty!
detailed_description: Included in this DLC is a pack of 20+ 4k wallpapers captured in game by photographer Chris Taljaard. Chris has masterfully captured these images using art of rally's in-game photo mode, showing us all what can be achieved when a pro gets their hands dirty!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.6 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.9 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650 or AMD equivalent
  • Additional Notes: MacBook Pro or iMac recommended
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.6 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 or AMD equivalent
  • Additional Notes: MacBook Pro or iMac recommended

name: art of rally 4k wallpaper pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.9 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.6 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Included in this DLC is a pack of 20+ 4k wallpapers captured in game by photographer Chris Taljaard. Chris has masterfully captured these images using art of rally's in-game photo mode, showing us all what can be achieved when a pro gets their hands dirty!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
